validation.E_11314: Take profit price must be greater than order price

orderform.LO: Buy | sell order at a specific price or better. The order is valid from when it is entered into the trading system until the end of the trading day or until it is cancelled.
orderform.MTL: Buy | sell order at a price higher or lower than the current price. The unmatched quantity will be converted to a LO order.
orderform.MOK: Buy | sell order at a price higher or lower than the current price. If the entire order cannot be executed, it will be cancelled immediately after entry.
orderform.MAK: Buy | sell order at a price higher or lower than the current price. The unmatched quantity will be cancelled immediately after matching.
orderform.ATC: Buy | sell order at the closing price, can be placed during the ATC session and is valid until 14:45.
orderform.PLO: Buy | sell order at the closing price, can be placed between 14:45 and 15:00 and is valid until 15:00.
orderform.STOP: Conditional order activated based on trigger price and validity. After meeting the conditions, the system will activate to automatically send buy | sell orders according to the customer's set price.
orderform.TCO: Conditional order to buy | sell at a predetermined price and quantity from 01 day to a maximum of 30 days.
orderform.OCO: Conditional order combining LO order and STOP order set in opposition to each other. When one order is activated, the other is automatically cancelled.
orderform.BULL_BEAR: Conditional order combining a buy | sell LO order, a LO take-profit order and a STOP stop-loss order. Take-profit and stop-loss values are set based on the absolute difference with the price of the buy | sell LO order.
